definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="world_switch_world"><field name="dimension">Surface</field><statement name="worldstatements"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%).
